body:
>'Brigading and frivolous use is something we'll need to discuss We know they don't care about free speech; only trolling and using "free speech" as a shield'

That's really disgusting.

Free speech **is** a shield, and you don't get to choose who gets it, that's what makes it fucking free.

Opinions you don't like aren't "frivolous use", except inasmuch as this entire site is frivolous use, unless you're going to shut down +DankMemes

I knew this place would get censored but I ~~didn't think~~ I absolutely thought it would happen this fast, but it's still sad.
body_html:
'Brigading and frivolous use is something we'll need to discuss We know they don't care about free speech; only trolling and using "free speech" as a shield'

That's really disgusting.

Free speech is a shield, and you don't get to choose who gets it, that's what makes it fucking free.

Opinions you don't like aren't "frivolous use", except inasmuch as this entire site is frivolous use, unless you're going to shut down +DankMemes

I knew this place would get censored but I didn't think I absolutely thought it would happen this fast, but it's still sad.

guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs

title: Is this quote from the admins real? It's really disappointing

author.ban_reason: Account closed due to legal dispute

body:
You're taking this out of context. 

The comment is in response on how to deal with brigaders and trolls who want to undermine that ruqqus stands for. These trolls do not care for free speech, they want to eliminate it.
body_html:
You're taking this out of context.

The comment is in response on how to deal with brigaders and trolls who want to undermine that ruqqus stands for. These trolls do not care for free speech, they want to eliminate it.

body:
Sure am glad I ground out a thousand rep for a site that's gonna flip on a dime and start banning because of MUH VOAT BOOGIEMAN.

Oh well. Admins had a nice goal, but they were weak people, and someone whispered in their ear. Goes the same way every day.

Sorry Truth, you lose again.

Sure am glad I ground out a thousand rep for a site that's gonna flip on a dime and start banning because of MUH VOAT BOOGIEMAN.

Sorry Truth, you lose again.

author.bio:
Secessionist-Elect  AldebaranIII (Fedpoasting with a red stapler and gorilla glue)


Reddit refugee.
author.bio_html:
Secessionist-Elect AldebaranIII (Fedpoasting with a red stapler and gorilla glue)

Reddit refugee.

body:
^ He's right and y'all know it even if you don't want to admit it for emotional investment or whatever the case may be. I know even saying this I'm putting my neck on the rep chopping block but 

"Many times in life I've regretted the things I've said without thinking. But I've never regretted the things I said nearly as much as the words I left unspoken.”

^ He's right and y'all know it even if you don't want to admit it for emotional investment or whatever the case may be. I know even saying this I'm putting my neck on the rep chopping block but

post.body:
>'Brigading and frivolous use is something we'll need to discuss We know they don't care about free speech; only trolling and using "free speech" as a shield'

That's really disgusting.

Free speech **is** a shield, and you don't get to choose who gets it, that's what makes it fucking free.

Opinions you don't like aren't "frivolous use", except inasmuch as this entire site is frivolous use, unless you're going to shut down +DankMemes

I knew this place would get censored but I ~~didn't think~~ I absolutely thought it would happen this fast, but it's still sad.
post.body_html:
'Brigading and frivolous use is something we'll need to discuss We know they don't care about free speech; only trolling and using "free speech" as a shield'

That's really disgusting.

Free speech is a shield, and you don't get to choose who gets it, that's what makes it fucking free.

Opinions you don't like aren't "frivolous use", except inasmuch as this entire site is frivolous use, unless you're going to shut down +DankMemes

I knew this place would get censored but I didn't think I absolutely thought it would happen this fast, but it's still sad.

guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs

body:
You are an idiot. It’s not opinions that are problems, it’s spamming, brigading and various other forms of attempting to apply a hecklers veto. 

Don’t let the door hit you on the way out.

You are an idiot. It’s not opinions that are problems, it’s spamming, brigading and various other forms of attempting to apply a hecklers veto.

Don’t let the door hit you on the way out.
